titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I celebrated at 8 a.m.: I preached at the Church Parade at 10 a.m. The Judge attended Mattins. Ella & I lunched at the Archdeacon's to meet him. Lord Durham & Lady Anne Lambton, Sir Timothy Eden & his mother, & the High Sheriff & M
Hustler were there. I preached at Evensong. The Judge & his Marshall came to tea. I shewed them the Cathedral, & Ella shewed them the House. Col: Herne also came to tea.
